4 Installation

4.2 From the World Wide Web

After downloading your MLWorks distribution from the Harlequin web site, follow these instructions to install MLWorks.

4. Double-click on the exe file that you downloaded from the Harlequin web site.This is a self-extracting executable which runs the InstallShield setup automatically. Click on Setup to start the installation procedure.

The InstallShield application will now guide you through MLWorks installation.

MLWorks is now fully installed.

MLWorks 2.0 Installation Notes - 12 Aug 1998
